segments.text: The restaurant across the street hired a new Chinese chef , so I ordered some Chinese food there for this evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I love Chinese food . What did you order ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Something hot and spicy . They look very inviting on the menu . You are going to love them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we can find a place to learn some Chinese cooking . I hear there's a place in Chinatown where you can take some courses . Are you interested ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not sure . I don't enjoy cooking that much . As long as we can order it from a restaurant , we don't have to learn to do it by ourselves .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right . But I just want to know how they prepare food and make it taste so different .
segments.speaker: S2
